title: Simulation-Based Unconscious Bias Awareness and Response Training

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic communication skills in educational settings
context.additional_context: Practical training program for pre-service teachers to recognize and respond to unconscious biases in science classes, emphasizing VR-based classroom scenarios and role-play feedback sessions

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three cases of unconscious bias based on gender/cultural background in simulation environments.
Learners can apply and execute at least two immediate response strategies when bias occurs in VR-based instructional settings.
Learners can document at least one biased behavioral pattern and establish improvement plans through peer feedback and debriefing.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
